data.title: Did you know the secret of Aishwarya Sakhuja and Pooja Sharma's friendship?
data.meta_description: Not many know that pretty actresses Aishwarya Sakhuja (Main Naa Bhoolungi) and Pooja Sharma (Mahabharat) are bestest of friends in real life. Yes, the two talented girls share a great bond in real life. And their association goes back a long way before they both made a mark in tinsel town. The two Delhite had been Miss India contestants in 2006 and hit it off instantly. Post that both got a chance to host shows in a music channel and thus moved to Mumbai. And today they both have built a successful career for themselves. | Tellychakkar.com
data.text:
Not many know that pretty actresses Aishwarya Sakhuja (Main Naa Bhoolungi) and Pooja Sharma (Mahabharat) are bestest of friends in real life.

Yes, the two talented girls share a great bond in real life. And their association goes back a long way before they both made a mark in tinsel town.

The two Delhite had been Miss India contestants in 2006 and hit it off instantly. Post that both got a chance to host shows in a music channel and thus moved to Mumbai. And today they both have built a successful career for themselves.

That surely says a lot about their friendship, right?
